item.title: Farewell Address to the CJEU by EU Judge Dehousse
item.description: Introduction by Professors Alemanno & Pech This blog post presents the English translation of a farewell address by Judge Franklin Dehousse, who served on the EU General Court from 2003 to 2016. Unusually, no public ceremony was held for the departing EU judges, including Judge Dehousse. This is likely due to Dehousse’s vocal criticism of the EU court system reform, a reform he extensively analyzed in several research papers.
